macro "Cyclops Tool - "{

run("Select None");
images = getList("image.titles"); //get list of open windows

Dialog.createNonBlocking("Cyclops");
Dialog.addChoice("RFP Image", images);
Dialog.addChoice("Timelapse Image", images);
Dialog.addNumber("Opacity", 70) ;
Dialog.show();

RFP = Dialog.getChoice();
TL = Dialog.getChoice();
Opacity = Dialog.getNumber();

selectWindow(RFP);
run("Red"); //Change RFP LUT to red
selectWindow(TL);
run("Grays");
run("Duplicate...", "title=[My duped timelapse] duplicate");
for (i = 1; i<nSlices()+1; i++) {
	selectWindow("My duped timelapse");
	setSlice(i);
	run("Add Image...", "image=[RFP] x=0 y=0 opacity=Opacity");
}
}
